website_summaries.verdict: A more affordable choice than some others, with easier assembly.
pros: A table that looks great without breaking the bank
Unlike other options, this table is easy to assemble
cons: Some customers noted bubbles and bumps on the playing surface

customer_reviews.title: Butcher block splits!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun, however, I haven't had this for even 10 months and butcher block is splitting. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: It has small bumps and ridges like it was not sanded or planed properly
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, mostly plywood and composite. The main issue is the table is not fully flat. I am not talking about level but the playing surface itself. It has small bumps and ridges like it was not sanded or planed properly. I contacted the company and basically said was normal. It plays okay but the pucks sometimes stop or turn when hitting a spot. I would have returned it except long wait and paid movers to put in our upstairs game room (they also took all the packaging). I went to a local bar that has shuffleboard tables and theirs are much smoother than this one.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when measuring available space you have to move this
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to get downstairs, don't forget about the 4 inches of overlap at the ends of the board when measuring how much room you need! I took out drywall or would have had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, but defective part so not working.  Seller not responsive.
customer_reviews.text: The shuffleboard is nice but one of the pieces is defective so it cannot be properly installed. I have emailed the seller several times with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, have really enjoyed so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have really enjoyed so far. My only complaint, and the reason I gave it four rather than five stars, is one end of the board has a slight bubble. It appears that the planks have a slight warp at one end but it's minimal and doesn't really affect gameplay. Other than that, the table is a perfect addition to our game room.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Shuffle board table arrived damage
customer_reviews.text: This is the response that I received from Playcraft. Could some at Amazon please contact me? We understand your disappointment. Glued wood components can fail at times which explains the crack in the top of the leg. The top of the playfield appears to have been damage during transportation by Amazon's carrier. The split in the MDF cross brace is rare but can occur. It shouldn't affect the play of the table or its lifespan. Based on Amazon's policies we are required to refer you back to Amazon for resolution. ​ Thank you ​Tim
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table for the price
customer_reviews.text: It may two people for some which is likely recommended, but I actually put it together myself and carried it in, creatively (a 60yo female)! I thought 12ft would be better, but that wouldn't fit. So I had to settle for the 9ft. Surprisingly, it's not all that short for playing. Have had lots of fun with it. I did get some silicone spray (specifically for shuffleboards) to put on top and then sprinkled the sand. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Webb

customer_reviews.title: So happy I decided to buy this table!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This table ROCKS! I did a lot of research and this turned about to be one of the best purchases I ever made. Extremely well-made and looks great. Make sure you properly measure your space because the table is massive. Delivery was also great as they helped move it inside and did not leave in the driveway. This was appreciated as the boxes were very heavy. If you want a great table for a extremely good deal, look no further. So happy I decided to buy this table!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Devine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly satisfied! No damage on the table at all! It plays wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Ein727

customer_reviews.title: Monster to move, high quality fun
customer_reviews.text: The shuffleboard is really high quality among those available through Amazon. The 12-foot that I bought just uses the center line as the scoring line and has 1, 2, and 3-point areas. People are NOT KIDDING about the weight. It needs 3 strong people to move, doesn't fit in most elevators, and is an absolute unwieldy beast of freight. It is extraordinarily well-protected in transit and will fill up your recycling bin with the contents, but it's totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Slaton

customer_reviews.title: Price is right for home and casual fun. It arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I got the 9 foot table. Price is right for home and casual fun. It arrived in perfect condition. no scratches or dents. It is heavy. It Comes in two boxes and the top is about 200lbs by itself. Needed help getting it upstairs. My concern is on the butcherblock. They are glued together and although look smooth when I rub my fingers across them they feel like there are ridges or uneven. Despite the table being level, gives off a weird feel. All in all for the price, seems like a nice serviceable talble for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN J HOGAN

customer_reviews.title: Price and fun
customer_reviews.text: So impressed! Very heavy- but easy to put together with two strong men. We host a lot of gatherings at our house with lots of indoor/outdoor games and so far this has been the go to game. So much fun and extremely satisfied with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katiehanson11

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected and wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 14' Expresso Colored Item. Top Notch.. Delivered Yesterday - the Boys and I were playing last night.. Great Fun... Delivered on time. Dropped in the driveway..- 500+ lbs including the pallets. Very Heavy. I got a few a couple of my sons, and a friend... and with 4 of us we maneuvered the very long box (359lbs) into our basement. It took me about 1 hour to assemble... and then the fun began.. It was great to get the boys off the game consoles and onto some real fun. Easy Assembly, and works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Looks high quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 separate peices via freight truck with 2 delivery men to help unload. It took about 2 hours to put the whole table together. The hardest part is leveling the playing surface! We ordered the cherry finish and it's perfect. It looks high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Elenore

customer_reviews.title: Nice Entry level table by Playcraft
customer_reviews.text: Shuffleboard is a lot of fun to play and this table is a good recreational table for people on a budget. The quality is ok, but you can tell this is an entry level table that should serve the purpose for family fun. The table was easy to setup and it was not too difficult to flip after the legs were installed. In a few years I may upgrade to a nicer 12 foot table, but for now this will do. I did not mess around with the climate adjusters yet and I use speed 6 wax- the wax it came with was too fast. Not a bad table for the money- should last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Wegman

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition to our game room. The table took 15 minutes to put together and less than 5 minutes to level. It is very heavy and required 3 physically fit individuals to carry it from the garage to it's location. If you have stairs you might need a 4th person. The playing surface is flawless. The score keepers included are very small and do not match the high quality of the table so we will be buying new score keepers. We've already had several hours of fun using this table. No regrets at all!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: It plays wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine a better 9ft. entry level table. The playfield is solid butcher block hardwood (not veneer). The cradle is solid and has 3 climate adjusters. The legs and trim look rich and fit in beautifully in my recreation room. Playcraft customer support is outstanding. It was delivered across the country in 9 days! I am glad I didn't buy a cheaper table since this one will be around for years. I highly recommend this shuffleboard table.
customer_reviews.author: Rad-man1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table, but Delivery was poor.
customer_reviews.text: The table is great and the price is awesome. My only issue is with the packing and delivery. A 14' shuffleboard tabe is EXTREMELY heavy and awkward and the crew that they sent to deliver mine acted like they didn't have a clue how to handle such a big heavy item. They barely got it off the truck and my sons and I had to do the rest. It's not packed quite well enough as a couple of the pieces were slightly damaged. But all in all it's a great table at a great price. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shuffleboard Table!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this set up for 5 months. (12 ft.) Great purchase! Everyone loves to play, even grandkids. Well made and has had no problems so far. Not as fancy as other more expensive ones, but works great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: Great and responsive service!
customer_reviews.text: I ran into trouble with the playing surface of my table due to one of the studs of the climate adjuster pressing through the wood at a joint. I reported the problem to eFamilyFun and they immediately sent me a new playing field to rectify the problem. I was very impressed with how fair and customer-oriented they were!
customer_reviews.author: M. Enget

customer_reviews.title: Nice House Size Shuffleboard table
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this table. Shipping was well managed and on time. Minimal assembly, took less than 30 minutes. Two people were necessary to lift it into position. Directions were minimal , they could improved. Table is well made and looks like it will last. I got the black 9’ model. Slower powder is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. George

customer_reviews.title: Polyurethane coating on the top is coming off.
customer_reviews.text: Originally we really loved this table. We have discovered that it gets used more than our pool table. We have it in a climate controlled room and it has never been wet. We also keep it covered when we are not using it. Unfortunately, the polyurethane coating on the top of the board is coming off. This will eventually make it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Brent W. Rowse

customer_reviews.title: Looooooooove it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and shipping was early and no damage at all. Trucking company even helped bring inside. It's a huge pallet but 9' is still doable with 2 people. Plays great and after years of anticipation glad we spent the money vs a cheap laminate board. Plays great and the whole family is impressed. Solid and beyond great for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. table is heavy and sturdy and plays well. obviously not a professional table but more than adequate for the average player. i am very pleased with the purchase. I'm not thrilled with the scorekeepers but for the price, you simply cannot beat this table. keep in mind it is all one piece and is over 12ft in total length, so keep that in mind when deciding where you can put it in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Delivery company was horrible, the product is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product however it took extremely long to receive. The delivery service is 100% to blame, XPO. XPO delivered 2 hours prior to our scheduled time and the item was damaged. They then called to set up delivery the same day we rejected the table due to damage. After receiving a call every other day to set up delivery we did receive a great item 3.5 hours prior to the scheduled time. Long story short, this shuffleboard table is awesome! If you order it make sure you have a delivery company that is legit. Do not allow XPO to deliver it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Competitively priced and looks as good as tables 3x the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first Amazon purchase we made that came in a box larger than a shoe box. We were impressed with the delivery and we found it easy to set up. We didn’t have any trouble leveling it. The slate is beautiful. I wish we would have ordered the darker wood frame color. It came with playing ice and the felt broom. Already have played countless fun games over the Thanksgiving holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. There are some areas (like the hidden shelves) could be a little stronger. Seems well made and much less cost that others I have seen. Nice addition to rec room.
customer_reviews.author: rdkmco

customer_reviews.title: Cannot contact customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received my shuffleboard table. and the can of wax was crushed with powder all over everything. I tried calling the phone number listed but could not talk to anyone. I am not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Solid surface, fun game.
customer_reviews.text: The 9' table is long enough for a fun game. Most important, the playing surface is very good and solid. The rest of the table is not quite the same quality, but nothing so bothersome as to diminish the enjoyment of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Having lots of fun practicing to beat ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made table. We love it. Having lots of fun practicing to beat my 6 year grandson when he visits. For the price you can beat it. Very nice playing surface.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little apprehensive buying due to other reviews, however, it was delivered the first day that they estimated, the delivery driver helped me gwt it into the garage. It is 12 feet long therefore make sure it will fit into your home. One puck was coming apart, I super glued it and will probably just buy another set , Im not really worried about that. Otherwise an awesome buy with no damage
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, 12 feet is a great length for the house
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table, great finish, better than I expected. Is heavy, Need 2 strong or 4 people to flip over after assembly and to put in place. Easy to level.
customer_reviews.author: Allan M

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I built a small brewery/bar in my basement and this was the perfect accent. Any time I have friends over now, all they want to do is play. It's well built, seems super sturdy and looks great. I'm a novice so I'm not expecting to play on a pro-table, this is plenty for me.
customer_reviews.author: Miggy Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table~
customer_reviews.text: This board just arrived yesterday. I was concerned because it came on such a large pallet (tip: be sure to have at least four strong people to unpack and load in), but it was packed VERY well. I had an experienced friend put it together and level it (it will need to be re-leveled in a couple of days once it settles). This table went into our family owned pub and I'm very pleased with the beauty of this table. Looks far more expensive than it is and plays wonderfully. Came with pucks and wax. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Stence

customer_reviews.title: Noticed the board was cracked in the middle only after ...
customer_reviews.text: Noticed the board was cracked in the middle only after assembling it. Also way too small a width of playing space. Sold on Craig’s List.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnybegood

customer_reviews.title: Love this shuffleboard table!
customer_reviews.text: We looked at several shuffleboard. We even went to Family Leisure and looked at some. Then we decided that the 9 foot shuffleboard table was right for us. So I went back to Amazon and started looking and reading reviews. After looking we finally decided on this 1 and we were worried about being able to put it together and how heavy it would be. Well I am telling it was very easily put together and my husband only needed help to flip it up on the legs. We are really enjoying this table and am so glad we purchased it! Would highly recommend this if you are looking for a 9 foot shuffleboard table!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Warning Only Two Legs
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this for our Adult Day Care for seniors with Alzheimer's. This is a perfect fun game. But we choose this model because it had three sets of legs in the picture because some of our clients are a bit wobbly. It only has two sets of legs. Two-legged models are hundreds less. We feel duped and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A challenge to move inside, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This shuffleboard table has been a major hit with our guests! But a few things weren't perfect: the support wood underneath (unseen to guests) was cracked - every one of them. And it should've been stressed that the table arrives in one really long 15' box. On the bright side, it's a gorgeous piece of furniture. Playing surface is smooth and professional in quality. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Harms

customer_reviews.title: Followed the directions and you will have an awesome table too....
customer_reviews.text: this table is quite awesome, everybody loves it, I wish I had room for a longer table, eventually that will happen.... awesome table .!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Busse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table for the money! Others we looked at were 3x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. We have enjoyed playing as a family and no matter the age everyone loves it. It is heavy so you will need help to assemble. But it is easy
customer_reviews.author: rmsuriani

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table for the money. It not the best if you are a professional, but for a home rec. room it is great. My kids and I love playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, sturdy, fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well constructed table providing hours of fun. Our table is 14 foot so the middle leg secures the table the way we wanted for our space. Although the table was extremely heavy, the 4 of us were able to lift it. Assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Provides lots of family fun.
customer_reviews.text: The surface of the playing table is a little rough in places so slows or stops the puck even though you have plenty of saw dust on it. For home use and family time it still a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expect hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: If you have the room this 16 ft table is great very well built ,Very easy to assemble biggest problem was getting it in my basement,I can see my family and friends spending hours on this table
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but the delivery is sluggish
customer_reviews.text: Good product but frustrating as the delivery time wasn't even close. Had scheduled delivery from 3-6 and got notified at 11 it was delivered so it was left out side with it snowing. Luckily didn't get damaged. Grrr
customer_reviews.author: Todd D Vercruysse

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's going to be a pain to get this 385 pound behemoth into your house but get some helpers and get it done. Table looks and plays great, fun for everyone. I had a scratch on one of the pucks and they replaced it within two days. Great purchase, solid company.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shuffleboard!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to our basement, love it! Great quality. Only addition was adding cup holders to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett N.

customer_reviews.title: ... for about 2 months have no issues yet works great was easy to set up as
customer_reviews.text: We have been playing on it for about 2 months have no issues yet works great was easy to set up as well
customer_reviews.author: Bobby J.

customer_reviews.title: Great shuffleboard to start
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to put together. Heavy and sturdy. Holding up so far. Like that it has level adjusters u see the table so when wood continues to dry or shift that you can level it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bms

customer_reviews.title: Grand kids love it so do the adults
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids love it so do the adults. One of the pucks plastic top won't stay on so I'll have to get a replacement. They could have included better instructions on preparation of the surfaced but you can find it on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: This table is very good quality and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This table is very good quality and easy to set up. The packaging was well done with a protective pallet and required 2 strong guys because of the weight. The scoring gauges are a bit cheesy though and we don't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Beaumont

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table! Received many compliments on how well it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table! Received many compliments on how well it functions and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2020!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - best purchase of Covid induced 2020. Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Automaticj5

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shuffleboard table. Easily set up. It is very heavy and awkward, so make sure you have someone (a few people) to help get it in the house. Shipped and delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Packaged very well and plays great. no complaints at this point
customer_reviews.text: no damage upon receiving package. Packaged very well and plays great. no complaints at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shuffleboard table! Comes with pucks and a can of wax and it is well worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and exactly as seen in the pictures. Very good Quality !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: The table is very heavy so make sure you have a couple of guys to help. Lots of fun with the family/neighbors. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KML

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered with a few dents nothing major, company gave me a $200 credit. Table is a hit, works great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Abal

customer_reviews.title: Family Gaming at home
customer_reviews.text: I found this product very satisfactory and would recommend it to anyone who loves to play shuffle board but dosent's have the room for the regulation table.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Consford

customer_reviews.title: Playcraft Woodbridge Shuffleboard Table
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you are ready to help the delivery person when your board gets there. Very Heavy! But love the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding play for the price of this very good quality board. It is quite fun and is always a big hit when entertaining guests and family. Get one of these while you can. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ODU19AT2

customer_reviews.title: Great shuffleboard table for game room!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and fairly easy to put together, although quite heavy! Fun to play and fits the given description. Would definitely recommend this for family fun.
customer_reviews.author: NicMac

customer_reviews.title: fun meema
customer_reviews.text: Table looks good in box legs are made very nicely we can't find the middle set of legs but we are hoping the are in the table box which is very heavy Having a guys bunch and lifting party this weekend hopefully the will be using the table before,they leave The table section is very heavy and you will need at least 3 people to move it where you want it keep you posted on set up
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: The table looks and plays nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: had a scratch or two when it arrived but nothing major. I believe it was scratched before it was packed for shipping. The packaging it was delivered in was quite impressive. The table looks and plays nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: wally

customer_reviews.title: better inspection befor shipping
customer_reviews.text: had two legs I had to repair before setup no damage to the shipping box so had to ship that way from the factory bolt holes were broken out
customer_reviews.author: R Huckaby

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item because of the natural board field. This can be sanded down and redone. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for husband and he loved it. Nice size for our game room. Having fun playing the game
customer_reviews.author: JOHN Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Ended up being perfect and 9' is plenty long to have fun
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about 9' length but it was the only space I had. Ended up being perfect and 9' is plenty long to have fun. Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Libby Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: The table is beautiful, well made and we have gotten many hours ...
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful, well made and we have gotten many hours of enjoyment from it already! It brings people together and we love that!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa G Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal, Free Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived in very good condition. Easy setup. Nice Table for price.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Shuffleboard madness
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shuffleboard. Heavy and nice looking. Its a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: bronson

customer_reviews.title: Everything else is good.
customer_reviews.text: Product came with two scratches on each side of the table. Everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mason

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good for the price. Very heavy to get into the basement, but assembly and set up was easy. Entire family is enjoying this game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12’ table is only 11’ play surface.
customer_reviews.text: Table is in great condition, the play surface is only 11’ on the 12’ table.
customer_reviews.author: ryan hammack

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. Top surface is 90% planed down but still have a few lips where wood was joined together. doesn't effect the game too much. Overall very happy with the table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Chester

customer_reviews.title: The table arrived in good shape. we are just now starting to use ...
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in good shape. we are just now starting to use it, haven't quite got it adjusted yet
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table especially if you are limited on space. We couldn't fit a pool table in our basement bar and this was a good alternative. It's heavy! The shipping was incredibly fast and the company great to deal with. If you get the 9ft table research the different speeds of wax. You're going to want a slower wax.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very well made table! Very impressed! Many memories already created.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This table is great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This table is great for the cost. The seller and the shippers were excellent. Family is really enjoying playing. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The customer service was great and the quality of the product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Great Table, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love the table, it has already provided hours and hours of fun! Make sure you have some friends available to help you get the table where you want it and to help set it up; It's very heavy!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great shuffleboard that everyone loves playing
customer_reviews.text: Never thought of buying something this large via Amazon, but between the selection, price, and free delivery, I thought I'd give it a shot. We LOVE this shuffleboard - prefect fit in the room where it is, and both kids and adults love it! Also got the mini bowling pins set, which is a fun change of pace on standard shuffleboard. Set up wasn't too bad either, but be sure to measure out where this will be delivered, and how you'll get it into its final resting place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The teenagers will hang out at our house now! Love this! Sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Does not have ten coats of polyurethane, only one.
customer_reviews.text: Item showed up on time with no damage. The issue is that the block only has one coat of polyurethane. It is very obvious and looks odd.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesnco

customer_reviews.title: This has been a big hit in the man cave ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a big hit in the man cave. You can't get any nicer of a product for the money anywhere. It was very simple to put together, took maybe 20 minutes tops. The quality of the table is exceptional and flawless.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Quality shuffleboard table
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice shuffleboard. It fit perfectly into a spot we had in a game room. The pucks are heavy and glide really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: This table was very heavy so be sure to have strong movers/lifters when it arrives. The table is fine for home use but there are flaws in the finish and uneven spots that we've discovered. We still enjoy the game and are happy we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Janene Lesko

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed - Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for over a year. Delivery people would not put into my walk-in basement because their cart could not navigate the curve in my sidewalk, but got two friends to help muscle it down the concrete. Setup was straightforward. Big hit during the holidays at very nice price point. Board and cabinet are heavy duty. If you thinking about it, get it...
customer_reviews.author: Reds Fan

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice; missing item
customer_reviews.text: The table seems like nice quality and was easy to put together but we are missing the 1 can of granular speed wax. I am contacting the company in hopes to get that resolved. When you order an $800+ item you would think all items would be accounted for.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: It came in good shape. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It came in good shape. Easy to put together. But there was an overspray of paint that was on the felt. So the inside looks dirty where the overspray is. Plus, the edges were not painted well. We had to do touch up in all the areas that we had to put it together. Otherwise, it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this thing is great..
customer_reviews.text: once it finally arrived!!!!!! this thing is great... be warned- this item comes in 3 pieces- the whole top comes as one as is like 300lbs! Easy to assemble with just 8 bolts... you need a friend to help for sure! Runs true and is a great addition for our game room
customer_reviews.author: adam gremo

customer_reviews.title: Great fun. And the delivery men even helped get ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Great fun. And the delivery men even helped get it to the porch. We just unpacked it there and brought it in piece by piece.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Tomasetti

customer_reviews.title: Way above expectations, high qualiy table!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible build quality, real heavy wood, large bolts, sturdy legs and very high quality playing surface. It was beyond my expectations, especially for the price. Feels like this should cost a couple thousand dollars or more. Extremely satisfied and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: We have been enjoying our table and have no complaints. The only difficulty was getting it to our basement. We needed four friends, strong friends to help. The unpacking and setup was accomplished in 30 minutes. The entire family has enjoyed playing and we range in ages from 7 to 70.
customer_reviews.author: kerry k klinger

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and level but make sure you have ...
customer_reviews.text: This was packaged with a five star rating. Very easy to assemble and level but make sure you have enough beef to carry it in the house. This weighed over four hundred pounds and was fifteen feet long.
customer_reviews.author: mike gustin

customer_reviews.title: But all else is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew free delivery was curb side. But all else is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Product was great and easy to put together and delivery was great
customer_reviews.text: Product was great and easy to put together and delivery was great. Only issue I had was it was supposed to come with the wax, but there was no wax at all which was disappointing because couldn't play right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to get started
customer_reviews.text: Well built and perfectly balanced. It has all the parts you need to start playing immediately. Pucks move smoothly and easily. Nice to have storage in the leg. Assembly was easy. This is a seriously heavy table and moving it was a bear.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Z

product_meta.title: Playcraft Woodbridge Shuffleboard Table
product_meta.description: The Playcraft Woodbridge is an affordable, high quality shuffleboard table. The 1-5/8" thick solid hardwood butcher block playfield (not a laminate) is finished with multiple coats of satin polyurethane to create a smooth, fast surface. Woodbridge 9’ & 12’ lengths include a 1-2-3 indoor scoring pattern and the 14’ & 16’ lengths include a 1-2-3-4 pattern. The Woodbridge one-piece cradle is constructed using hardwood micro-lam plywood and hardwood corners for increased stability. The interior walls and floor are finished with color coordinated carpet. The cradle is supported by rigid, reinforced double-paneled pedestal legs with 6” metal leg levelers featuring in leg storage compartment. The 9 & 12’ lengths use 2 legs and the 14’ & 16’ use 3 legs. Playing equipment includes, set of eight, 2 1/8" deluxe playing weights, (4 blue & 4 red), 1 can of granular speed wax and 2 plastic slide scorers.
feature_bullets: 1-3/4" thick solid hardwood butcher-block playfield finished with multiple coats of satin polyurethane to create a smooth, glossy, fast surface
Rigid reinforced double-paneled arched pedestal legs with metal leg levelers and hinged door with shelves for storage
Deluxe pucks, Brush, high quality wax and matching abacus included
